text: This is a list of episodes of the British situation comedy The Brittas Empire. Each episode has a brief story and the date it was first shown. The show was first shown on BBC1, between 1991 and 1997 . Seven series and 52 episodes were created, including two Christmas specials. There was also one Children In Need short sketch. ==Episode list== ===Series 1 (1991)=== No. Title Original airdate ===Series 2 (1992)=== No. Title Original airdate ===Series 3 (1993)=== No. Title Original airdate ===Series 4 (1994)=== # Title Original airdate ===Series 5 (1994)=== No. Title Original airdate ===Christmas Special (1994)=== No. Title Original airdate ===Series 6 (1996)=== No. Title Original airdate ===Christmas Special (1996)=== No. Title Original airdate ===Series 7 (1997)=== No. Title Original airdate ==Notes== ==References== * ==Other websites== *IMDb - The Brittas Empire - Episodes *BBC - The Brittas Empire - Episodes Category:Lists of comedy television series episodes
